Taking a [pc.step] back from the counter, you wonder whether to do as Fae suggests and buy some clothing in order to get another Faire ticket, or instead head off and forget about trying to win another prize...

Not wanting to miss this opportunity, you tell the foxtauresses that you want to kiss them. Their faces light up as they hear you say this, and Fae and Siliva quickly step forwards and lean over the counter in anticipation of what's about to happen. Batting her eyelids, Fae teases, [fae.speech(Come on, [pc.name]. I'll be your first...)]

Moving forwards, you lean in towards Fae, and as you bring your mouth towards hers, she reaches forwards and takes hold of your head, before pulling you in and planting a big, wet kiss on your [pc.lips+]. The scent of delicate perfume surrounds you as the horny foxtauress continues to press her lips against yours, and she lets out a muffled, happy little moan as she kisses you.

[silvia.speech(Come on, Fae, it's my turn now!)] Silvia impatiently declares, before playfully pushing her sister aside. Fae's lips pull away from yours with a loud, wet smacking noise, and before you can do or say anything, Silvia leans forwards and presses her own lips against your mouth. Happily leaning in to you, the blue-eyed foxtauress continues where her sister left off, and plants a series of big, wet kisses on your [pc.lips].

Just as you're really starting to enjoy the experience, Silvia pulls back and sighs, [silvia.speech(You're a good kisser, [pc.name]...)]

With more than a hint of jealousy in her voice, Fae declares, [fae.speech(Well, my kiss was better than yours, Silvia.)]

With the two foxtauresses continuing to lean forwards over the counter, and with their eyes continuing to hungrily roam over your body, you wonder whether to take things further or to end things here...

Having had your fun, you [pc.step] back from the counter and thank Fae and Silvia for the prize. Standing upright once again, Fae flashes you a cheeky smile and asks, [fae.speech(Hey, why don't you buy some expensive clothing to get another ticket? With the two foxtauresses waiting to hear what your response will be, you wonder whether to do as Fae suggests and buy some clothing in order to get another Faire ticket, or instead head off and forget about trying to win another kiss...

Not yet satisfied, you lean back over towards Fae and once again press your [pc.lips+] against her mouth, before taking hold of her head and starting to passionately kiss her. Her bushy fox-tail excitedly twists around behind her, and with a happy, muffled moan, she desperately returns your kiss. Parting her lips, the foxtauress thrusts her tongue into your mouth and leans even further forwards over her counter in her desperation to make out with you. As her tongue slides over yours, you feel that she's got a barbell piercing through it, and as you experimentally run your tongue over it, she lets out a muffled giggle.

After watching your lewd display for a couple of minutes, Silvia lets out a loud, frustrated sigh, before rudely butting in and pushing her sister away. Before either of you can react, the blue-eyed foxtauress impatiently grabs hold of your head and desperately presses her mouth against yours. Happy to give Silvia a turn, you spend another few minutes making out with her, during which time you discover that she too has a barbell piercing through her tongue. Eventually, at the incessant prompting of her sister, Silvia reluctantly pulls back, bringing an end to your fun.

[fae.speech(We don't get customers like you very often...)] Fae whines, before flashing Siliva a questioning glance. After her sister has given her an approving nod, the green-eyed foxtauress looks back at you and says, [fae.speech(The two of us go to 'The Centaur's Sword' every evening after work. If you want more than just a kiss, then you can find us in there between seven and ten...)]

[silvia.speech(I hope we'll see you in there soon,)] Silvia says, before letting out a playful giggle and asking, [silvia.speech(Did you want to buy anything, [pc.name]? Or if you've got another ticket, then maybe you could roll to earn another kiss...)]

With the two foxtauresses waiting to hear what your response will be, you wonder whether to do as Silvia suggests, or instead say goodbye and take your leave...
